title: Lamb shanks with ancho chilli honey glaze
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 lamb shanks', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 dried ancho chillies - chopped, stemmed and seeded', '500ml chicken stock', '1L passata', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 bay leaf', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 dried ancho chillies, stemmed and seeded', '1L boiling water', '100g honey', '1 teaspoon grated orange zest', '200g natural yoghurt', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', 'salt to taste']
